TRONmod:SlashingStrike.NAME: Slashing Strike
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Can't SLASH without NL Disk in hand!

TRONmod:BasisDisk.NAME: Basis Disk
TRONmod:BasisDisk.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL tronmod:Disk remove !M! Block and add !M! damage. NL Deal !D! damage to random enemy twice.

TRONmod:Periphery.NAME: Periphery
TRONmod:Periphery.DESCRIPTION: If you have no playable cards in hand at the end of your turn, gain !M! Strength.
TRONmod:Periphery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you have no playable cards in hand at the end of your turn, gain !M! Strength and !M! Dexterity.

TRONmod:AcrobaticThrow.NAME: Acrobatic Throw
TRONmod:AcrobaticThrow.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! tronmod:Parkour. NL Draw !M!, then tronmod:Throw 1.

TRONmod:FromWallToWall.NAME: From Wall to Wall
TRONmod:FromWallToWall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! tronmod:Parkour. Double your next-turn Block.

TRONmod:Calculation.NAME: Calculation
TRONmod:Calculation.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play cost X card, its effects increased by !M!.

TRONmod:InfectedIncision.NAME: Infected Incision
TRONmod:InfectedIncision.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! tronmod:Bug, NL then double it. NL Deal !D! damage.

TRONmod:AbraxasCode.NAME: Abraxas Code
TRONmod:AbraxasCode.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Next time you should die, revive with HP equal to your tronmod:Bug and loose 5 max HP.
TRONmod:AbraxasCode.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Next time you should die, revive with HP equal to your tronmod:Bug and loose 5 max HP.

TRONmod:AirAssault.NAME: Air Assault
TRONmod:AirAssault.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage random enemy X times. NL Deals additional !M! damage for each 10 Parkour you have.

TRONmod:BreakDisk.NAME: Break Disk
TRONmod:BreakDisk.DESCRIPTION: Choose a Disk from your hand to remove from your deck. Add [#9a9599]1[]/[#6ee3ed]2[]/[#f9bc3f]3[] *Abraxas *disk *shards to your deck. NL Exhaust.

TRONmod:Ricochet.NAME: Ricochet
TRONmod:Ricochet.DESCRIPTION: tronmod:Throw a card from hand X times.
TRONmod:Ricochet.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: tronmod:Throw a card from hand X+1 times.

TRONmod:SimpleHack.NAME: Simple Hack
TRONmod:SimpleHack.DESCRIPTION: Increase next cost X card effect by !M!.

TRONmod:Antigravity.NAME: Antigravity
TRONmod:Antigravity.DESCRIPTION: At the end fo your turn shuffle *Gravity *Anchor to your draw pile.
TRONmod:Antigravity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end fo your turn shuffle *Gravity *Anchor to your draw pile.
